markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armor Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2064) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 191 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=76)

**Prerequisites**
[Sentinel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2062)

</column>

---

You have trained hard to optimize your armor's protective qualities. You gain the armor specialization effects of medium and heavy armor.
name: Armor Specialist
